tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is a rockstar. I wanna thank her for all she has done for me. She explains everything with great detail and patience and not scaring you a bit. She patiently answers all your questions. I m really thankful that I got her as my OBGYN. This is from a person who is even scared of needles, the confidence that she gave me to go through surgery. I didn't have a single scare or doubt because I had utmost faith in her hands. Angel for me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I was having gestational diabetes.Throughout my pregnancy Doctor helped me a lot and also always she was available in case of any emergency. Also she is a very good counsellor that’s what I feel personally. I used to ask all queries which wasn’t relevant  but still she calmly listen everything and cleared all my queries.
I had a miscarriage in my 1st pregnancy.So during this second pregnancy I was afraid a lot. Shilpa Ma’am supported me mentally as well as guided me how to take care of myself during this pregnancy.
I am very much grateful to her. Now I’m a mother of beautiful angel.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
To Dr shilpa kava mam 
 
Dear mam thank you so much for being with  me at 
every step of my pregnancy and birth journey. you 
are the best and we cannot thank you enough for your advice, support and encouragement.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: didn't satisfied with her explanation about my issue.not happy with her suggestions.really I don't suggest her for anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor Shilpa is very friendly and the way she explained the things related to procedure and treatment was quite good and the overall experience with her was amazing. I highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Dr. Shilpa Kava is very friendly and approachable. She made my pregnancy journey very smooth. Her consultations was always  awesome cause of her friendly nature and clear explanations.. She was available 24/7 for all my queries. With help of her guidance I was able to deliver baby normally through NVD. Thank you for all your support during my pregnancy and post care as well.

tags: None
review:
Dr.Shilpa Kava  has been incredible throughout my pregnancy journey and delivery. She is not only friendly but also cautious about prescribing medication. Her calm personality and  support have been invaluable during this period. She always prefer normal delivery but remains open to suggesting a c-section in case of complications. The accessibility she provides through calls and messages with prompt replies has made the entire experience more reassuring.

During labor, I found myself nervous and unable to endure the pain, prompting me to beg for a c-section. However, she reassured me, emphasizing the positive progress and encouraging a normal delivery. In the labor room, her motivational presence was akin to a goddess, providing the strength I needed. True to her words, I successfully delivered a healthy and active baby boy that evening. I am immensely grateful to my doctor and wholeheartedly recommend her.

tags: None
review: So my journey with Dr. Shilpa Kava mam started in the month of May 2023. Once we got to know that we are about to become parents, we reached out to mam. She was amazingly supportive and helpful to respond and guide us in the last 9 months. This Jan we were blessed with a healthy baby girl and we are very happy and thankful to her for her guidance throughout this journey. I would rate 5/5 and definitely recommend others to visit mam for any pregnancy related consultation and delivery. Thanks to mam once again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Shilpa kava is very generous doctor. She explains the procedure, complications and pro or cons in detail and lay man language. She gives appropriate time and patience to patients. I didn’t had such a good experience with all doctors i meet in my life span. Thank you so much doctor for bringing “Nirvi” my lovely daughter to my life.

tags: None
review:
Very kind. 
Always has a smile which kind of transfers the positive vibes on to you. 
She was very helpful during our journey of becoming second time parents. 
She put up with my tantrums, and also managed to convince me out of them always. 
Always Spends enough time explaining details. 
If I were to recommend an OBGYN to my frends or family or an accquaintance - she would be the first on my list.
